title: A few questions
body:
Several of the individual boards have developed their own individual communities, and communication within those places can be incredibly limited, Is there any way for that problem to be alleviated?

Also, will there be a way for the board peasants to have access to them fancy backdrops?

replies.body:
Communication with who, exactly? Do you have a particular board or boards in mind? If you say Gameplay and getting Rioter responses I'm gonna splash you.

And it actually takes a lot of work to get those special posts up (well, if you aren't just copying from one that's already made), and they can easily be broken and mess up the entire page; this won't be a feature for regular use.

communication with specifically the other people that use that board, so for instance if you are trying to get a bunch of people from the story, art, and sound board to come together and theorycraft on the current goings ons of runterra, or get a bunch of people from memes and games together for a meme off. as it stands I believe that due to those particular posts having so little to do with the actual subsection that they end up being removed.

and aww, too be expected though. maybe one day.

> 
> and aww, too be expected though. maybe one day.

There is actually an additional board feature available for download that has included this feature in the past (a boards private message system, any one your board profile has friended can send you private messages) but the feature was a bit buggy so tundra fizz pulled it for a while.

You can ask around GD and see if FEK still has that feature and it's been fixed, or you could jump straight to downloading the Forum Enhancement Kit and begin making use of its several other additional features immediately.

I believe the page to find the fek download is stickied in the misc sub board, and Tundra Fizz can often be found roaming the boards if you've got any questions for him.

It would be cool to have an ingrained board feature for PMs but we've been making do with a third party one when it works.

You are commendable for telling me these things,
But I don't know how helpful any of them will be, especially considering my circumstance.

It's by no means required but for those users who would like some of the additional functionality the boards yet lack and won't have for some time yet, fek is as good as it gets. Wuks is doing something similar as well and both will increase the options available to board users in the immediate future while we wait for the board dev team to do board dev things.

So as I understand your concern, there should be more leniency on threads that may be posted in a similar sub-board but not necessarily the best sub-board for the thread? Are you thinking it's an issue on how moderation is happening, or do you think it's an issue more with sub-board culture?
probably more on a thing of sub-board culture
We could group some sub-boards together, but there would have to be some long discussions involved with that. Good question, though! I'm not really sure how we can change that part.
